attributes.review: This app is horrible. I thought I was going to find helpful information but all I found was a Cheeto trying to be a doctor and a lot of fake news.

attributes.review: as soon as i downloaded this app it asked for my location. I denied the request but the next day trump showed up outside my house in an ice cream truck with tinted windows and an outdated license plate and demanded that i get inside the ice cream truck

I coded and they were, unfortunately, able to rescue me. This app is a public danger and so is everybody running it including the orange cheeto man.
